original: The Tao that can be trodden is not the enduring and unchanging Tao. The name that can be named is not the enduring and unchanging name.
translation: The Tao that can be trodden is not the enduring and unchanging Tao. The name that can be named is not the enduring and unchanging name.
paraphrase: What can be fully grasped or named is not the deepest truth. The essence lies beyond words.

original: All that we are is the result of what we have thought: it is founded on our thoughts, it is made up of our thoughts.
translation: All that we are is the result of what we have thought: it is founded on our thoughts, it is made up of our thoughts.
paraphrase: Your inner world shapes your experience. Notice your thoughts without judgment.

original: You have a right to perform your prescribed duty, but you are not entitled to the fruits of action.
translation: You have a right to perform your prescribed duty, but you are not entitled to the fruits of action.
paraphrase: Do what is yours to do, then let go of the outcome. This brings peace.

original: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
translation: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
paraphrase: Your inner response is your own. External events happen, but you choose how to meet them.

original: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
translation: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
paraphrase: When you trust in the greater flow, you find that you have enough.

original: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
translation: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
paraphrase: Trust deeply, beyond what your mind can figure out. Something wiser holds you.

original: The highest good is like water. Water gives life to the ten thousand things and does not strive.
translation: The highest good is like water. Water gives life to the ten thousand things and does not strive.
paraphrase: Be like water: gentle, flowing, giving without effort. This is true strength.

original: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but by love alone is healed. This is an ancient and eternal law.
translation: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but by love alone is healed. This is an ancient and eternal law.
paraphrase: Only love can heal what hatred creates. This truth is timeless.

original: A person is said to be established in self-realization and is called a yogi when he is satisfied by knowledge and understanding.
translation: A person is said to be established in self-realization and is called a yogi when he is satisfied by knowledge and understanding.
paraphrase: Peace comes when you rest in understanding, not in having more.

original: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
translation: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
paraphrase: Your inner landscape shapes your days. Tend to your thoughts with care.
